DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effectiveness safety investigational drug talnetant treat subject irritable bowel syndrome ( IBS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Eight-Weeks Of Treatment With Talnetant In Subjects With Irritable Bowel Syndrome ( IBS )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Subjects require conduct selfassessments IBS symptom use touchtone telephone system duration study ( 15 week ) . Must diagnose IBS consistent Rome II criterion . Must normal result colonic procedure within 2 year randomization . Must conduct selfassessments least 12 day document average IBS pain discomfort score great equal 1.5 twoweek screening phase . Exclusion criterion : Selfassessment stool 7 day twoweek screening phase . Clinically significant abnormal laboratory test . Current evidence history various condition , comorbidities , surgery Irritable Bowel Disease ( IBD ) , gastrointestinal surgery , diverticulitis . Inability use touchtone telephone system . Hypersensitivity quinolone antibiotic quinolone derivative . Diagnosis psychiatric disorder within past 2 year stable dose medication least 6 month . Women pregnant , breast feeding , plan become pregnant study . Permitted medication : The subject allow take follow medication , provide maintain stable dose least 30 day prior Screening visit throughout remainder study : Antidepressants , except REMERON Antihypercholesterolemics Iron supplement Bulking agent Fiber supplement Thyroid replacement therapy ( levothyroxine ) Antipsychotics Cox2 inhibitor ( CELEBREX ) Prohibited medication : Subjects must stop take medication take treat IBS symptom must take prohibited medication least 7 day prior Screening visit must remain medication duration study .
